problem_names:
lemma prl2:
  assumes g: "prl g" shows "fst (prc g f) = False"
translations:
lemma prl2:
  assumes g: "prl g" shows "fst (prc g f) = False"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) = False
proof (rule ccontr)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "\<not> ?thesis"

proof (state)
this:
  fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False
obtain b where gf: "prc g f = (True, b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>b.
        prc g f = (True, b) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (cases "prc g f", auto)

proof (state)
this:
  prc g f = (True, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
obtain b1 b2 where gg: "prc g g = (b1, b2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>b1 b2.
        prc g g = (b1, b2) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by force

proof (state)
this:
  prc g g = (b1, b2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
obtain b' where fg: "prc f g = (b', True)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>b'.
        prc f g = (b', True) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using prl[OF g, of f]

proof (prove)
using this:
  snd (prc f g) = True

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>b'.
        prc f g = (b', True) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (cases "prc f g", auto)

proof (state)
this:
  prc f g = (b', True)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
from prc_compat[OF gf fg gg] gg

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (b \<and> True \<longrightarrow> b2) \<and>
  (b \<and> b' \<longrightarrow> b1) \<and>
  (True \<and> True \<longrightarrow> b1)
  prc g g = (b1, b2)
have gg: "fst (prc g g)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b \<and> True \<longrightarrow> b2) \<and>
  (b \<and> b' \<longrightarrow> b1) \<and>
  (True \<and> True \<longrightarrow> b1)
  prc g g = (b1, b2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g g)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  fst (prc g g)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fst (prc g f) \<noteq> False \<Longrightarrow> False
with SN_on_irrefl[OF prc_SN]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>a\<in>UNIV. (a, a) \<notin> {(f, g). fst (prc f g)}
  fst (prc g g)
show False
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
abbreviation "pr \<equiv> (prc, prl)"
end
end
